markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sarkorian God-Caller Garb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1375)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Explorer's Clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Each _Sarkorian god-caller garb_ is emblazoned with a unique sigil of a particular Sarkorian deity and adorned with symbols sacred to Sarkorian god callers, the summoners and religious leaders of Sarkoris. These _+1 [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_ outfits look as if they were stitched together from multiple types of animals, featuring feathers, fur, leather, and scales.

 When you cast a 3-action summoning spell while wearing this armor, the summoned creature gains a magical sigil that matches the one on the armor. As long as it is within 30 feet of you, the summoned creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC. If it ever moves farther than 30 feet from you, the sigil fades and the creature loses the status bonus to AC, even if it later comes within 30 feet of you again.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb
